com.github.ylc.toy.Product

public abstract class Product
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class for representing all toy products in Toy Store.

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree()
      Returns the boolean value for if this product is free based off the price.
      Returns:
      true if the price is less than or equal to 0.0, false if the price is greater than 0.0.

    • isFree

      public boolean isFree​(double cost)
      Returns the boolean value for if a product is free based off the cost.
      Parameters:
      cost - The value which will be used to determine if a product is free.
      Returns:
      true if the cost is less than or equal to 0.0, false if the cost is greater than 0.0.
